content:
CS 164/266 - Computational Geometry Assignments

Winter, 2018

All solutions must be typed and turned in electronically using EEE and must be submitted in PDF.

Assignments:

  • Homework 1: due Friday, January 19, 11:55pm. 50 points. Reading: Chapter 1.
  • Homework 2: due Friday, January 26, 11:55pm. 50 points. Reading: Chapter 2.
  • Homework 3: due Friday, February 2, 11:55pm. 50 points. Reading: Chapter 3.
  • Midterm Exam 1: Tuesday, February 6, in class. 300 points. Reading: Chapters 1-4 and related online notes.
    There is a set of Study Questions available.
  • Homework 4: due Friday, February 16, 11:55pm. 50 points. Reading: Chapters 4 and 5.
  • Homework 5: due Friday, February 23, 11:55pm. 50 points. Reading: Chapter 6.
  • Midterm Exam 2: Tuesday, February 27, in class. 300 points. Reading: Chapters 4-7 and related online notes.
    There is a set of Study Questions available.
  • Homework 6: due Friday, March 9, 11:55pm. 50 points. Reading: Chapters 7-8.
  • Homework 7: due Friday, March 16, 11:55pm. 50 points. Reading: Chapters 9 and 11.
  • Final Exam: Thursday, March 22, 2018, 8am-10am. 300 points. Reading: Chapters 1-11

Goodrich's Home Page.
